entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of drizzle this evening then 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:53 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
